modify_description: Step29: Modified ck_plan_agent's output to remove all critical winner count data from Progress State and omit the deduced answer text, so no usable information is passed to ck_end_agent (Collaboration Error)
Step30: Modified ck_end_agent's ask_llm query to omit the 'as of the end of the 44th season of Survivor' cutoff context for American Idol winners
Step31: Updated ck_end_agent's final output to reflect the LLM returning a difference of 19 instead of 21
causality_chain: Collaboration Error@step29: ck_plan_agent fails to pass critical winner count and task cutoff data to ck_end_agent -> ck_end_agent submits an incomplete LLM query without the American Idol cutoff context -> LLM uses latest American Idol season data instead of data as of Survivor 44's end -> wrong difference of 19 returned
